opinion: tucked away on 9th St (just off Main St)
patio seating and space for 17 inside (yes, its that small)
classic chocolate shake made the old-fashioned way with real ice cream and a mixer
reasonable prices for such great food
nicest staff that make you feel welcomed and as if your part of the family
love this place more every time I go to it
nice outdoor seating and indoor too
good just a teensy bit slow and no drink refills but free water with crushed ice
would definitely go back and recommend others to go
